duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and coordinate the operational aspects of ongoing Channel Sales activities.
Help customers with orders, returns, inventory, and other customer specific issues of safety products.
Serve as liaison between Channel Sales leadership and distributors.
Review status of projects and budgets.
Coordinate schedules and prepare status reports.
Assess project issues and develop resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and customer satisfaction goals and objectives.
Develop mechanisms for monitoring Channel Sales progress and for problem-solving with project managers, line managers, and customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or related field (MBA preferred)
